title: MUSA 5080 Portfolio
text:
This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (MUSA 5080).


Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.




Weekly Notes: My learning reflections and key concepts
Labs: Completed assignments and analyses
Final Project: Capstone modeling challenge




A RANDOM PERSON




Email: cui12@upenn.edu
GitHub: @ChristineCui12

title: Week 1 Notes - Course Introduction
text:
GitHub Fundamentals

Git

Version control system that tracks changes in files

GitHub

Cloud hosting for Git repositories

Key GitHub Concepts

Repository(repo)
Commit
Push
Pull


Quarto Introduction

Quarto

Publishing system that combines Code (R, Python, etc.), Text (explanations, analysis), Output (plots, tables, results)


Markdown Basics

Text Formatting
Headers
Lists
Links and Images

R and dplyr Review

Tibbles vs. Data Frames

“tibbles” - enhanced data frames(Shows first 10 rows by default, Displays column names)

Essential dplyr functions

select()- choose columns
filter()- choose columns
mutate()- choose columns
summarize- choose columns
group-by- choose columns
